name: Babbit
description:
*CLICK PLAY in the upper right corner to exit the tutorial/enter the level! I'm sorry I didn't make this more clear on the UI itself. ;)*

A short somewhat maze-like platformer for Wowie Jam 3.0. Take some leaps of faith and see where it takes you, failing jumps (may) work out in your favor!  I hope you enjoy.

I'm so proud to have finished something for this jam, as well as complete my first game! (for the most part heh)

I hope you can find the 'secret' pass!

All Music and Sound Effects from ZapSplat.com

All Art made by me using my mouse and Krita paint program

A Tutorial and 1 Level, short game <3

______________________

A/D or Left/Right keys to move

Spacebar to jump

*Edit, I tried to fit the theme by making the level skippable. If you fall off the left side of the map when you enter the game (or from most heights) you should hit a 'secret' platform with a spring that will shoot you to the top. Sorry that it's not a very clear way to use the theme, but i'm very thankful you gave it a shot. Thanks friends! :)
